result.eng: Sit down in this comfortable chair.
result.ga: Suigh síos sa chathaoir chompordach seo
result.orig: Suigh síos sa chathaoir chompordach seo
result.html: Suigh síos sa chathaoir chompordach seoSit down in this comfortable chair.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ síos sa ċaṫaoir ċompordaċ seoSit down in this comfortable chair.

result.eng: The cat is under the chair.
result.html: Tá an cat faoin chathaoirThe cat is under the chair.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cat faoin ċaṫaoirThe cat is under the chair.

result.eng: She is sitting in the chair.
result.ga: Tá sí ina suí sa chathaoir
result.orig: Tá sí ina suí sa chathaoir
result.html: Tá sí ina suí sa chathaoirShe is sitting in the chair.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ina suí sa ċaṫaoirShe is sitting in the chair.

result.html: Tóg den chathaoir éTake it off the chair.
result.ponchtml: Tóg den ċaṫaoir éTake it off the chair.

result.html: Tá cathaoir ansinThere is a chair there.
result.ponchtml: Tá caṫaoir ansinThere is a chair there.
